meanings.definition: In a way that produces good or useful results
meanings.sent1: She worked productively on her project and finished it ahead of time.
meanings.sent2: The team collaborated productively to complete the task efficiently.
meanings.sent3: He hummed productively while organizing his desk, making the task more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The seeds planted productively blossomed into a beautiful garden of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The student's focused study habits led to a productively high score on the exam.

meanings.definition: In a way that is efficient and effective
meanings.sent1: The new software helped the company work productively without any delays.
meanings.sent2: By managing time productively, she was able to complete all her tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The chef chopped vegetables productively, impressing the diners with his speed.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked productively, generating innovative ideas for the project.
meanings.sent5: The machine operated productively, increasing the factory's output significantly.

meanings.definition: In a way that contributes to the achievement of a goal
meanings.sent1: The team brainstormed productively to come up with a winning strategy.
meanings.sent2: She communicated productively with her team to ensure everyone was on the same page.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered nuts productively, preparing for the long winter ahead.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to practice productively paid off during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The students collaborated productively to organize a successful charity event.
